backend/main.mo: Defines actor with authorization mixin, extensive U.S. geography and proposal types, and helpers returning empty data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking UX changes to specific frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of key frontend files covering architecture docs, styles, components, hooks, and proposal UI logic.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Explains Whisper’s architectural vision, hierarchical installations, ICP canister mapping, and modular subsystem design.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Developer deployment guide with dfx configuration, upgrade workflow, cycle management, and best‑practice notes.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Details homepage redesign including new hero image, overlay, CTA contrast fixes, typography, spacing, and UI effects.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Outlines phased development plan from architecture to multi‑installation support with deliverables, hooks, and non‑goals.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Explains how features register navigable destinations for the Secretary assistant via option buttons, keyword routing, and deep links.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Defines Whisper’s visual design system including color palette, typography, and accessibility-focused design principles.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, layout, and component styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing layout, Secretary assistant behavior, navigation registry setup, and deep-link handling.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: UI flow for creating an instance, handling geographic selection, name generation, validation, and proposal submission.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog showing proposal details with loading/error states and admin moderation actions.
Lists all instance creation proposals with loading, error, and empty states, and opens proposal detail dialogs.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: UI card prompting users to try the AI Secretary with a dismiss button and start conversation action.
Floating chat widget enabling interaction with the Secretary assistant, handling messages, options, and chat state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Provides hooks to check instance name availability and submit instance creation proposals via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Debounces a changing value to delay updates, useful for throttling input-driven API calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
Persists React state to localStorage with SSR safety and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of backend query hooks for relationships, proposals, single proposal retrieval, and admin status checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages Secretary chat state, messages, menu logic, and interpreting user selections or free-text input.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Provides a registry for navigation destinations with register, unregister, search, and trigger functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Mutation hook to update a proposal’s status and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React-query hooks to fetch US states, counties, and places with error handling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining a high-contrast navy/teal design with utilities.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Formats proposal geography into readable text and provides labels for geography levels.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Parses and generates deep links and matches text keywords to navigation options.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata and requirements for updating the homepage hero image, adjusting overlay warmth, and fixing CTA button contrast and styling issues.
